admin/editor.info-card.title: InfoCard
admin/editor.info-card.description: A component with image and text that you can choose how to display them
admin/editor.info-card.isFullModeStyle.d: If true, image provided will be used as a background image and text will be displayed over it
admin/editor.info-card.textPosition.desc: Choose in which position of the component text will be displayed, left, center or right
admin/editor.info-card.headline.title: Headline
admin/editor.info-card.headline.descript: Text to be displayed as a headline inside component
admin/editor.info-card.subhead.title: Subhead
admin/editor.info-card.subhead.descripti: Text to be displayed underneath headline inside component
Controls how your call to action is displayed
Text to show inside call to action component
admin/editor.info-card.callToActionUrl.d: Url to redirect to when CTA is clicked
admin/editor.info-card.imageUrl.title: Image
admin/editor.info-card.imageUrl.descript: Image to be used on desktop
admin/editor.info-card.mobileImageUrl.de: Image to be used on mobile
admin/editor.info-card.textAlignment.des: Control the text alignment inside component
admin/editor.info-card.imageActionUrl.de: Pass URL to make image a link and able to redirect user

admin/editor.notification-bar.descriptio: A component that show any text in a bar style

admin/editor.product-images.title: Product Images
admin/editor.product-images.description: Product images component allow you to customize the product images
admin/editor.product-images.position.des: Used only when orientation is vertical
admin/editor.product-specifications.hidd: Type names of specifications you want to hide
admin/editor.product-specifications.visi: Type names of specifications you want to appear. Only provide one of the hidden specifications or visible specifications
admin/editor.logo.title: Logo
admin/editor.logo.description: Component to show your store logo
admin/editor.logo.href.title: Link to redirect
admin/editor.logo.href.description: Link to be redirected when logo is clicked. Leave empty to make it not clickable.

admin/editor.logo.width.title: Width
admin/editor.logo.width.description: Width to be used for logo.
admin/editor.logo.height.title: Height

admin/editor.logo.title.description: Alternative text to be provided to logo image
admin/editor.logo.mobileWidth.title: Mobile Width
admin/editor.logo.mobileWidth.descriptio: Width to be used on mobile. If empty, will use the provided width value.
admin/editor.logo.mobileHeight.title: Mobile Height
admin/editor.logo.mobileHeight.descripti: Height to be used on mobile. If empty, will use the provided height value.
